net.sf.oval.configuration.xml
Class XMLConfigurer.AssertCheckConverter

java.lang.Object
  net.sf.oval.configuration.xml.XMLConfigurer.AssertCheckConverter
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.Converter, com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.ConverterMatcher
Enclosing class:
XMLConfigurer
protected final class XMLConfigurer.AssertCheckConverter
extends Object
implements com.thoughtworks.xstream.converters.Converter

The converter is needed to allow the rendering of Assert's expr attribute value as an XML node value and not an XML attribute <assert><expr>...</expr></assert> instead of <assert expr="..."> This allows users to write complex, multi-line expressions.
